MarketConfiguration.title: MarketConfiguration
MarketConfiguration.description: Configuration settings specific to a single edition of the annual market, allowing for yearly variability and administrative control over global market parameters.

id.description: Unique identifier for the MarketConfiguration entity.

marketYear.description: The specific calendar year for which this market configuration applies (e.g., 2024). This helps segment data annually.

editionNumber.description: The ordinal number or name of this market edition (e.g., '1ère édition', 'Édition Spéciale Noël'). This can be displayed on the website.

posterImageUrl.description: URL to the hosted image of the main promotional poster for this market edition, displayed on the main page.

notificationEmail.description: The email address where administrator notifications are sent and which is placed in CC for exhibitor communications.

signupCode.description: Global invitation code for admin creation.

preRegistrationStartDate.description: The date and time when the initial pre-registration form (Form 1) becomes available to exhibitors.

preRegistrationEndDate.description: The date and time when the initial pre-registration form (Form 1) closes and no new applications are accepted.

detailedInformationDeadline.description: The final deadline for accepted exhibitors to submit their detailed information via Form 2.

currentMarket.description: A flag indicating if this market configuration is currently the active one for the website.

PreRegistration.title: PreRegistration
PreRegistration.description: Represents an initial pre-registration application submitted by a potential exhibitor for a specific market edition (Form 1).

id.description: Unique identifier for the PreRegistration entity.

applicantName.description: The full name of the primary contact person for this application.

companyName.description: The name of the company or organization applying.

email.description: The contact email address for the applicant.

phone.description: The contact phone number for the applicant.

productCategory.description: A description or category of the products/services the exhibitor intends to offer.

applicationDate.description: The date and time when the pre-registration application was submitted.

status.description: The current status of the pre-registration application.

EmailTemplate.title: EmailTemplate
EmailTemplate.description: A template for emails sent to exhibitors.

AdminRole.title: AdminRole
AdminRole.description: Represents a user with administrative privileges in the system.

addedAt.description: The date and time when the administrator access was granted.

AdminRequest.title: AdminRequest
AdminRequest.description: A request from a user to become an administrator.

invitationCode.description: The unique code generated for this requester.
